Illuceo.text: Have a fire in the bedroom

Illumino.text: Have fires in the bedroom and sitting-room

Imago.text: What Hotel do you recommend in ---

Imberbis.text: --- when did he leave your Hotel

Imbibo.text: --- left in Hotel, send to me at ---

Imbrex.text: --- left in Hotel, send to me here

Imbrifer.text: --- left in my room, send to me at ---

Imbuo.text: --- left in my room, send to me here

Imitatio.text: --- left this Hotel to go to ---

Immadeo.text: --- has not yet left this Hotel

Immemor.text: Have sent articles left in your room as instructed

Immensus.text: Send articles left in my room to ---

Immergo.text: Send articles left in my room to this address

Immigro.text: Have sent luggage left in your room, as instructed

Imminuo.text: Send luggage left in my room to ---

Immisceo.text: Send luggage left in my room to this address

Immixtus.text: Any letters or other communication arriving for me send to ---

Immodice.text: Any letters or telegrams arriving for me keep until I arrive

Immolo.text: Any letters or telegrams arriving for me redirect them to ---

Immorior.text: Any letters or telegrams arriving for me redirect them to this address

Immotus.text: Some letters lying here for you, what shall be done with them

Immugio.text: Some letters and telegrams lying here for you, what shall be done with them

Impages.text: Some telegrams lying here for you, what shall be done with them

Impasco.text: --- missing on arrival here, can you trace it
